Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ftp

Class FTPServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bluezoo.gumdrop.Connector
      • org.bluezoo.gumdrop.Server
        • org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ftp.FTPServer
  • public class FTPServer
extends Server
    Connection factory for FTP control connections on a given port.
    Author:
    Chris Burdess

      • setRequireTLSForData

        public void setRequireTLSForData​(boolean require)
        Sets whether TLS is required for data connections. When true, data transfers will fail unless PROT P has been issued.
        Parameters:
        require - true to require TLS for data connections

      • isRequireTLSForData

        public boolean isRequireTLSForData()
        Returns whether TLS is required for data connections.
        Returns:
        true if TLS is required for data connections

      • isSTARTTLSAvailable

        public boolean isSTARTTLSAvailable()
        Checks if SSL/TLS context is available for AUTH TLS.
        Returns:
        true if AUTH TLS is supported, false otherwise

      • createDataSSLEngine

        public javax.net.ssl.SSLEngine createDataSSLEngine()

        Returns:
